page.title: 15HOUSING.
page.content: In our area studied,it was found that most of the houses were either semi-detached or bungalows.Along { {Maesdu Avenue}were the most expensive houses,prices ranging from sixty up to one hundred thousand pounds.However, as we moved towards {Llanrhos}the prices dropped to around nineteen thousnd pounds.Most of the houses were owner-occupied and lived in mainly by elderly people.These elderly people did not seem to come from the locality originally. Overlooking the golf couse there were new developments,maisonettes known as 'Legoland'due to their unusual construction.Next to these was a new development under construction for the cheaper market by Wimpey Homes Ltd.This is to become known as Traeth Melyn.
